name: Rebecca Dalton
text: Been going to this Pizza Hut for years.  Good service and food.

name: Brent Hurley
text: Quick and always hot and fresh! Very happy and nice people who work at this location!

name: Chad Cox
text: Gotta say Pizza Hut has up'd their game.  Honestly pretty good pizza.  Dinner box deal is really good.  Lots of food for a good price.

name: Ren N.
text: This place makes the best pizza, we always order from here and the employees are great.

name: Daniel Glauser
text: Good pizza, always fresh and super fast

name: Psi Trick
text: Nobody out pizzas the hut. Also the dude was nice.

name: Free Bird
text: I always get good pizza from this location but this time when I called I got a call center. ðŸ˜’ I don't like that at all. The call center was short and not polite. I would rather talk to the store themselves. Probably will not call again

name: Alyssa L
text: Iâ€™ve worked in the plaza for 5 years and Iâ€™ve always had a great experience. I get a personal pan mostly and itâ€™s always amazing. Super nice staff too.

name: matt matthey
text: The first time i tried to order delivery from here (to a hotel directly across the parking lot) the manager informed me that "The driver had already made 2 deliveries to that hotel and won't want to drive over there again."   So I ordered â€¦More

name: Colin Nickerson
text: Ready when promised for carryout. Ordered from the app...easy...only complaint is that PAN crust is an upgrade NOT mentioned until checkout...the teaser promo is not what you might pay..pizza was exactly what it was supposed to be

name: Mary Risley
text: Best Pizza Hut in Sarasota.  I order from my phone and my order is perfect every time.  The pan crust is light yet crispy.  The thin crust is thin and crispy as described.  I order light cheese and they always do it right.  The online â€¦More

name: Chance Hoffman
text: Food was made timely, friendly service.

name: Ricardo Alonso
text: Customer service was great! Food was okay compared to most pizza huts. Can definitely improve.

name: norma palomares
text: I'm fairly new to the area, but once I got settled in it was time to find my local Pizza Hut! And I gotta say, I found a good one. I have ordered several times w/delivery and so far they have done a "GOOD JOB" every single time! The food is always hot and fresh. Thanks to the crew!!

name: K
text: My husband and I order pizzas at least once a week from this location. We received an email for a free pizza and tried to use it online and could not. We called and spoke with the manager John and he would not redeem the coupon we received. â€¦More

name: L. V.
text: Danielle (the manager) is awesome! They are fast, delicious and consistent! Thank God for Pizza Hut on Market Street, Danielle & Pizza Friday!

name: Robb Digman
text: They screwed up a very simple order I placed IN PERSON. I was more than clear about what I wanted. I didn't even bother with getting it fixed as I was in a hurry and they didn't seem capable of anything right. I went back to my hotel and the manager even said they won't recommend them.

name: REALDEALFU1 yo
text: Pizza is always on point...they pay attention to your order requests and are very customer friendly

name: Bill Webster
text: Not much sauce or toppings bad

name: christina elmore
text: As far as pizza hut goes, this place is on point. It has never messed up my order..and the girl at the register is always super nice. The food isn't bad either. Take out place...no where to dine in. You can place your order online and pick up.

name: Bhadresh Desai
text: Bad pricing there is no deal. Rip you off.

name: Jay Michaels
text: Pizza is always a fantastic treat and this Pizza Hut is fantastic. I've ordered from them on take-out and delivery multiple times, always top notch! I'll 100% be back again. :D

name: big buff
text: This is by far one of the cleanest huts I have ever visited...NO ONE OUT PIZZAS THIS HUT

name: Travis Streeter
text: Ordered delivery twice and they screwed up royally on both orderes never ordering their again worst service Iâ€™ve ever had at Pizza Hut

name: corbeano
text: Put an order in online, drove 20 min and no pizza. Iâ€™ve had poor service before and delivery forgot things twice. Thatâ€™s why I tried to carry out. Pizza Hut canâ€™t do that either.

name: Hisham Khourshid
text: Great place. .. great Service

name: Mr. M O
text: love their stuffed crust

name: Koral Gardea
text: Customer service was poor.  The lady who answered the phone was very rude (she literally screamed ) and lacked effiency, we are staying in a hotel 5 minutes away  and the pizza is taking an hour to arrive.

name: Taylor Nunez
text: There is nothing more frustrating when you order pizza and breadsticks being 9 months pregnant, online says estimated 30-40 mins, and you get your food 70 mins later and the food isnâ€™t hot.

name: Rafael Torres
text: Not only did I wait 2 hours they brought me cold tasteless pizza and the garlic knots were not even edible I will never give them business again!!! if your going to be an hour late you would think the food would atleast be warm!!!!! I give them the one star for the pepsi.

name: EuSmell Shaoug
text: Ordered three pizzas online for delivery. Pizzas came in a good amount of time. Nothing was overcooked; all pizzas were delicious and came as ordered. Was a bit hesitant using this Pizza Hut bc of the reviews but yall did great. Thanks.

name: Save The Bee Newsletter & Funnies
text:
Pizza & pasta was good & hot . Service was good
But they gave no fork for pasta & none were in the lobby to get myself.  No where to sit so ONLY pick up or delivery

name: Michael Oreto
text: This pizza hut has excellent food. I eat there regularly. I highly recommend it.

name: Richard Campbell
text: This was absolutely the most disgusting  and foul tasting pizza I have ever had .   I ordered two pies both tasted like they had sat uncovered in the refrigerator for weeks  then reheated by microwave.  The pizza was terrible it just tasted â€¦More

name: MarÃ­a Laura Villalobos
text: Just love it!

name: Paula Baker
text: Have been going to this location for over 10 years and it is by far the cleanest and they have very nice employee's

name: George Parker
text: Fast services and good food.

name: Erin Kessler
text: Ordered a pizza, received my delivery confirmation via email with estimated delivery time. They never showed up and I never received a cancellation notice. We called the next day to find out what happened and the store "manager" claimed â€¦More

name: David Dixon
text: They're Gluten free pizza is the best!

name: claire wells
text: I've just received my pizza, and it it the best one I've received from you guys, keep doing what your doing.

name: Kelly Crawford
text: Not able to pay online or over the phone for pickup but also won't deliver to my address which is only 12 minutes away...Pizza hut has always been my favorite but this time had to go to Dominos who let me pay over the phone and will deliver to my door. Company policy should be revisted to prevent losing customers.

name: Robin H
text: Lol they're always late of weekend nights. I just want my food y'all!

name: Bill Mitchell
text: Used to order delivery all the time made one mistake called the manager on it asked him to correct for me and all he could say is i should not expect free pizza when i make the mistake.Wow so much for customer loyality.I guess i will go else where he's doing pretty good without my buiness.

name: Jeff P
text: Odd that my earlier review regarding delivering to Greyhawk Landing was removed.  Here's the Domino's confirmation: â€¦More

name: Tom Willson
text: Great service.

name: Team HellMammoth
text: Garbage delivery orders late all time cold etc last time we order pizza hut

name: Michelle White
text: Frank is a great delivery guy! He talks to every guest he walks by in the hotel and makes them smile, thanks for sending him out!

name: Elizabeth Greenwell
text: Delicious

name: Lesa Miller
text: Pizza is the quality you expect, service can be slow.

name: Just Fish
text: Always good pizza

name: jolene hopkins
text: Take out is quick

name: Amy Carr
text: Very quick service

name: olive Akashiya
text: Yummy wings
